description:
When an untimely wind blows Keroro`s hat off of the laundry line, it ends up in the hands of a little girl in the neighborhood. Keroro tries to get it back, which is a major challenge since she can now turn invisible with the anti-barrier, while Keroro is visible to everyone and everything.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Please Give Only That Back!
ケロロ それだけは返してちょーだい!
